Interface ExplicitRegularization<N extends Number>

Type Parameters:
N - Number type
All Superinterfaces:
NumberTypeAgnostic<N>, Regularization<N>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElasticNet, LASSO, Ridge
@Mechanism(PENALTY_BASED) public interface ExplicitRegularization<N extends Number> extends Regularization<N>
Explicit regularization involves modifying the objective (loss) function directly by adding a penalty or changing the targets.
